message.body: How did it GOOOO yesterday?
Good morning: wendy gave me some underwear: ￼
ok so my apple store appointment is 1:45 today
meaning i have to be there by 1:30
so if you want to meet me around then, let me know
if i don’t hear from you ill give you a call when I’m finished
Hey. Ok. I'm going to brunch in Summerville at 11:30 I may still be there at 1:30 but can meet you afterwards?
Perfect
That underwear....
No rush
I know right
I already sent to Nate
Oh my god.
Hahaha
Yey it will be great to hang out. I'm going to drive over so it will be easy to get back
Uggg well not if it's snowing
Blah
Ok my brunch go cancelled. I can meet you at apple at 1:30 :)
Maybe we can get lunch.
After your aponent ment
Ok I'm about to hope in the shower. I ran in the snow call me when you finish teaching in soooo excited to hang out!
About to get to Apple Store I can call u after or text
Ok. I'll start heading down town I can meet you around there I'm just getting dressed
Ok I'll be at apple then I have to go back to longchamp
Ok. Well do you want to meet up still
It's kinda crappy out I don't mind going to longshomp with you but I sorta want to make sir we will be meeting up if I come
Out

Yes! As I said earlier, I have apple appointment at 1:45. So I'm here doing that. Then running to longchamp. If you want to join me (it's me running errands so it might be boring for you) I'll be quick at longchamp. Not sure how long here (at apple). But I'll def call you when I'm done. (Latest prob around 3).
Ok that's why I tried to call you this morning you said t meet at 1:30.
No I said I have to be at apple store at 1:30
Haha
Stupid text messaging.
You also said let me know if you want to meet around then. I don't mind coming with you but I do feel a bit irritated that this is a moving target
That's why I called...
I'm sorry. Didn't mean to make it confusing. This is the plan. It's like the only Apple appointment all week so I can't really be flexible.
Ok so I'm leaving because I'm really to go
Ready
Yeah no I understand. Ill just head down and meet you around he Apple Store.
Ok. I'm on third floor.
Ok!
Really cute Jewish genius
